quiz.title: Supporting ML Operations and Data Sharing in Google Cloud

questions.questionText: Cymbal Retail has a team of ML engineers that builds and maintains machine learning models. As a Professional Data Engineer, how will you support this team?
options: A. Finalize the type of machine learning model to use.
B. Identify what type of data is required to build ML models.
C. Keep on improving the machine learning model after initial deployment.
D. Process and prepare existing data to enable feature engineering.
questions.explanation: Supporting ML engineers by processing and preparing data for feature engineering is crucial as it enables them to effectively build and tune their models.

questions.questionText: You need to share inventory data from Cymbal Retail with a partner company that uses BigQuery to store and analyze its data. What tool can you use to securely and efficiently share the data?
questions.explanation: Analytics Hub allows secure and efficient sharing of data across organizational boundaries, making it ideal for sharing inventory data with a partner company using BigQuery.
